long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension aims to remove the duplicate tabs with same url in the browser window. Hover on the tab listing in popup with tab count > 1 , click on it and it will close all duplicate tabs with same url except one thus making your browsing experience efficient.

Just a simple one for lazy developers like me :)
